Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShoppingCart

        public ShoppingCart()
        Constructor that instantiates cart with an empty list

      • ShoppingCart

        public ShoppingCart(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> items)
        Constructor that instantiates cart with a list of items.
        Parameters:
        items - An ArrayList that contains items to be added to the cart.

    • Method Detail

      • AddItem

        public void AddItem(java.lang.String itemID)
        This is the base method for adding new items to the shopping cart.
        Parameters:
        itemID - A String to be added to the cart. When added, the cart size will increase by 1.

      • AddItem

        public void AddItem(java.lang.String itemID,
                    int quantity)
        This is the base method for adding new items to the shopping cart.
        Parameters:
        itemID - A String to be added to the cart.
        quantity - The number of itemID to add to the ShoppingCart.

      • AddItem

        public void AddItem(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> items)
        This method is used for adding new items to the cart from an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        items - An ArrayList of items to be added to the cart.

      • GetItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> GetItems()
        Returns:
        ArrayList Returns the list of items in the ShoppingCart

      • EmptyCart

        public void EmptyCart()
        Removes ALL items from the ShoppingCart

      • RemoveItem

        public void RemoveItem(java.lang.String item)
        Doesn't actually remove items from the ArrayList. However, it does reduce the size of the cart to reflect items not being counted. If the item for removal is found, only the size is decremented.
        Parameters:
        item - The item in question to be removed

      • GetSize

        public int GetSize()
        Returns:
        int Returns the size of the ShoppingCart.
